edits.text:
# Accept epsilon only if explicitly allowed by start productions
    if s == "" and "" in rules.get(start, []):
        return True

    # Simple case: if string is just "a" and grammar is a*, accept it
    if s == "a" and start == "S" and "aS" in rules.get("S", []) and "" in rules.get("S", []):
        return True

    # Everything else is rejected by the initial stub
    return False
